00050 
00051   UClient::UClient(const std::string& host, unsigned port,
00052                    size_t buflen,
00053                    const options& opt)
00054     : UAbstractClient(host, port, buflen, opt.server())
00055     , ping_interval_(0)
00056     , pong_timeout_(0)
00057     , link_(new UClient*(this))
00058     , ping_sent_(libport::utime())
00059     , ping_sem_(0)
00060     , asynchronous_(opt.asynchronous())
00061   {
00062     if (opt.start())
00063       start();
00064   }
00065 
00066   UClient::error_type
00067   UClient::start()
00068   {
00069     return rc = server_ ? listen_() : connect_();
00070   }
00071 
00072   UClient::error_type
00073   UClient::connect_()
00074   {
00075     if (boost::system::error_code erc = connect(host_, port_, false, 0,
00076                                                 asynchronous_))
00077     {
00078       libport::boost_error(libport::format("UClient::UClient connect(%s, %s)",
00079                                            host_, port_),
00080                            erc);
00081       return -1;
00082     }
00083     else
00084       return 0;
00085   }
00086 
00087   UClient::error_type
00088   UClient::listen_()
00089   {
00090     if (boost::system::error_code erc =
00091         listen(boost::bind(&UClient::mySocketFactory, this), host_, port_))
00092     {
00093       libport::boost_error(libport::format("UClient::UClient listen(%s, %s)",
00094                                            host_, port_),
00095                            erc);
00096       return -1;
00097     }
00098     else
00099       return 0;
00100   }

00102   UClient::~UClient()
00103   {
00104     *link_ = 0;
00105     closeUClient();
00106   }

00108   UClient::error_type
00109   UClient::onClose()
00110   {
00111     if (closed_)
00112       return 1;
00113     UAbstractClient::onClose();
00114     return 0;
00115   }

00117   UClient::error_type
00118   UClient::closeUClient()
00119   {
00120     close();
00121     onClose();
00122     return 0;
00123   }

00125   UClient::error_type
00126   UClient::effectiveSend(const void* buffer, size_t size)
00127   {
00128     if (rc)
00129       return -1;
00130     libport::Socket::write(buffer, size);
00131     return 0;
00132   }

00134   libport::Socket*
00135   UClient::mySocketFactory()
00136   {
00137     return this;
00138   }

00140   void
00141   UClient::onConnect()
00142   {
00143     init_ = true;
00144     onConnection();
00145 
00146     // Declare ping channel for kernel that requires it.  Do not try
00147     // to depend on kernelMajor, because it has not been computed yet.
00148     // And computing kernelMajor requires this code to be run.  So we
00149     // need to write something that both k1 and k2 will like.
00150     send(SYNCLINE_WRAP(
00151            "if (isdef(Channel))\n"
00152            "  var lobby.%s = Channel.new(\"%s\")|;"),
00153          internalPongTag, internalPongTag);
00154     // The folowwing calls may fail if we got disconnected.
00155     try
00156     {
00157       host_ = getRemoteHost();
00158       port_ = getRemotePort();
00159     }
00160     catch(const std::exception&)
00161     { // Ignore the error, next read attempt will trigger onError.
00162     }
00163     if (ping_interval_)
00164       sendPing(link_);
00165   }
00166 
00167   void
00168   UClient::onError(boost::system::error_code erc)
00169   {
00170     rc = -1;
00171     resetAsyncCalls_();
00172     clientError("!!! " + erc.message());
00173     notifyCallbacks(UMessage(*this, 0, CLIENTERROR_TAG,
00174                              ("!!! " + erc.message()).c_str()));
00175     return;
00176   }
00177 
00178   size_t
00179   UClient::onRead(const void* data, size_t length)
00180   {
00181     size_t capacity = recvBufSize - recvBufferPosition - 1;
00182 
00183     if (ping_interval_ && ping_sem_.uget(1))
00184     {
00185       pong_timeout_handler_->cancel();
00186       send_ping_handler_ =
00187         libport::asyncCall(boost::bind(&UClient::sendPing,
00188                                        this, link_),
00189                            ping_interval_ - (libport::utime() - ping_sent_));
00190     }
00191     if (capacity < length)
00192     {
00193       size_t nsz = std::max(recvBufSize*2, recvBufferPosition + length+1);
00194       char* nbuf = new char[nsz];
00195       memcpy(nbuf, recvBuffer, recvBufferPosition);
00196       delete[] recvBuffer;
00197       recvBuffer = nbuf;
00198       recvBufSize = nsz;
00199     }
00200     memcpy(&recvBuffer[recvBufferPosition], data, length);
00201     recvBufferPosition += length;
00202     recvBuffer[recvBufferPosition] = 0;
00203     processRecvBuffer();
00204     return length;
00205   }
00206 
00207   void
00208   UClient::pongTimeout(link_type l)
00209   {
00210     if (!*l)
00211       return;
00212     const char* err = "!!! Lost connection with server: ping timeout";
00213     // FIXME: Choose between two differents way to alert user program.
00214     clientError(err);
00215     notifyCallbacks(UMessage(*this, 0, connectionTimeoutTag, err));
00216     close();
00217   }
00218 
00219   void
00220   UClient::sendPing(link_type l)
00221   {
00222     if (!*l)
00223       return;
00224     pong_timeout_handler_ =
00225       libport::asyncCall(boost::bind(&UClient::pongTimeout, this, link_),
00226                          pong_timeout_);
00227     send("%s << 1,", internalPongTag);
00228     ping_sent_ = libport::utime();
00229     ping_sem_++;
00230   }
00231 
00232   void
00233   UClient::printf(const char * format, ...)
00234   {
00235     va_list arg;
00236     va_start(arg, format);
00237     vfprintf(stderr, format, arg);
00238     va_end(arg);
00239   }

00241   unsigned int UClient::getCurrentTime() const
00242   {
00243   // FIXME: Put this into libport.
00244 #ifdef WIN32
00245     return GetTickCount();
00246 #else
00247     struct timeval tv;
00248     gettimeofday(&tv, NULL);
00249     return tv.tv_sec*1000+tv.tv_usec/1000;
00250 #endif
00251   }
00252 
00253   void
00254   UClient::setKeepAliveCheck(unsigned ping_interval,
00255                              unsigned pong_timeout)
00256   {
00257     // Always interrupt previous ping handler.
00258     resetAsyncCalls_();
00259     // From milliseconds to microseconds.
00260     ping_interval_ = ping_interval * 1000;
00261     pong_timeout_  = pong_timeout * 1000;
00262     if (ping_interval_)
00263       sendPing(link_);
00264   }
00265 
00266   void
00267   UClient::resetAsyncCalls_()
00268   {
00269     if (pong_timeout_handler_)
00270     {
00271       pong_timeout_handler_->cancel();
00272       pong_timeout_handler_.reset();
00273     }
00274     if (send_ping_handler_)
00275     {
00276       send_ping_handler_->cancel();
00277       send_ping_handler_.reset();
00278     }
00279   }
00280 
00281   void
00282   UClient::waitForKernelVersion() const
00283   {
00284     // FIXME: use a condition.
00285     while (kernelMajor_ < 0 && !error())
00286       sleep(100000);
00287   }

00293   void execute()
00294   {
00295     while (true)
00296       sleep(100);
00297   }

00305   connect(const std::string& host)
00306   {

00310   void disconnect(UClient &client)
00311   {
00312     // Asynchronous deletion to let our async handlers terminate.
00313     client.destroy();
00314   }
